DOC.brief_summary: This observational , non-interventional retrospective study patient advance PD treat Rotigotine ( Neupro® ) prescribe physician accord usual clinical practice Spain . The Primary Objective evaluate Non-Motor Symptoms ( NMS ) advance PD patient treat Rotigotine least 6 month .
DOC.brief_title: Non-interventional , Retrospective , Multi-center Study Evaluate Non-motor Symptoms Advanced Parkinson Disease ( PD ) Patients Already Treated With Rotigotine
DOC.criteria: To eligible participate study , follow criterion must meet : Male female ambulatory patient Parkinson 's disease diagnosis ( per London Brain Bank diagnosis criterion ) ≥6 month ago Patient age 30 year old time Parkinson 's disease diagnosis Patients treatment Rotigotine follow routine clinical practice , either alone combination Levodopa , advance PD dosage ( ≥ 8 mg/ 24 h ) least previous 6 month Patients treatment Rotigotine ( ≥ 8 mg/ 24 h ) assess twice NMS mean PDNMSQ 6 month apart Patients currently inform give enough time opportunity think participation ( data collection ) study give write informed consent Patients permit enroll study follow criterion meet previous 6 month : Patients Parkinsonian syndrome different Parkinson´s disease Patients history Pallidotomy , Thalamotomy , Deep Brain Stimulation Fetal Tissue Transplant Patients Dementia , active Hallucinations active treat Psychosis Patients neurological / psychological disorder Patients receive Central Nervous System ( CNS ) active therapy ( e.g . sedative , hypnotic , antidepressant , anxiolytic , atypical neuroleptic , etc )
